name: subgraph-protocol-v2
description: This package contains subgraph of the protocol v2

scripts.update-abi-addresses: npm run update-address && npm run prepare:abi
scripts.prepare:all: npm run prepare:contracts && npm run prepare:subgraph
scripts.prepare:contracts: npm run agave:install && npm run agave:compile-contracts
scripts.prepare:contracts:local: npm run agave:install && npm run deploy-contracts && npm run update-address
scripts.agave:install: npm run agave:init && git submodule foreach npm install --no-save --no-fund --no-audit
scripts.agave:compile-contracts: git submodule foreach npm run compile
scripts.agave:deploy-contracts: git submodule foreach npm run aave:docker:dev:migration
scripts.agave:deploy:scenario: git submodule foreach npm run test-subgraph:scenarios
scripts.deploy-contracts: npm run agave:compile-contracts && npm run agave:deploy-contracts
scripts.deploy-stack:local: npm run prepare:all && npm run subgraph:local
scripts.deploy-stack:local:scenario: npm run agave:deploy:scenario && npm run update-abi-addresses && npm run prepare:subgraph && npm run subgraph:local
scripts.deploy-stack:local:post-scenario: npm run update-abi-addresses && npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=agave/dev npm run subgraph:deploy:local
scripts.deploy:hosted:kovan: NETWORK=kovan env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2-kovan env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=1hive/agave-rinkeby env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2 env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:self-hosted:kovan: NETWORK=kovan npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2-kovan npm run subgraph:deploy:self-hosted
scripts.deploy:self-hosted:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v2 npm run subgraph:deploy:self-hosted
scripts.deploy:local:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=agave/dev npm run subgraph:deploy:local
scripts.run:rinkeby: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.fork.rinkeby.yml -f docker-compose.override.yml up -V --build

author: AAVE <tech@aave.com>
